content.en: Algorithmic data mining: Researchers are exploring the potential and challenges of using algorithms in data mining and knowledge discovery. They are integrating algorithms into application frameworks to support high performance and grid computing. Additionally, algorithms are being extended and optimized to handle big data analytics and improve the efficiency of machine learning on distributed and heterogeneous systems.
content.da: Algoritmisk data mining: Forskere undersøger potentialet og udfordringerne ved at bruge algoritmer i data mining og vidensopdagelse. De integrerer algoritmer i applikationsrammer for at understøtte høj ydeevne og grid computing. Derudover udvides og optimeres algoritmer for at håndtere big data-analyse og forbedre effektiviteten af maskinlæring på distribuerede og heterogene systemer.
